definition: Arbor Day (March 12th), also known as National Tree Planting Day 全民義務植樹日|全民义务植树日[Quan2 min2 Yi4 wu4 Zhi2 shu4 ri4]
National Tree Planting Day (March 12th), as known as Arbor Day 植樹節|植树节[Zhi2 shu4 jie2]
pinyin: Quan2 min2 Yi4 wu4 Zhi2 shu4 ri4

sentences.english: Land of afforest of large area afforestation is the one big task that crosses century China.
sentences.chinese: 大面积植树造林绿化国土是跨世纪中国的一大课题。

sentences.english: Afforestation has been promoted heaily in mid-latitudes as a means of mitigating climate change.
sentences.chinese: 在中纬度地区大力提倡植树造林以减缓气候变化。

sentences.english: Not all the students went to plant trees on Tree Planting Day.
sentences.chinese: 植树节那天并非所有的学生都去栽树了。

sentences.english: In different countries, Planting Trees Days are on different days.
sentences.chinese: 在不同国家，植树节在不同的日子。

sentences.english: They shift the place of tree planting into building, but they plant basin scenery at home.
sentences.chinese: 把路边上植树的地方又来盖楼房，在家里在盆景。

sentences.english: For instance, many tree-planting, and that of our environment is very good.
sentences.chinese: 比如，多植树，那对我们的环境很有好处。

sentences.english: 268:The villagers were planting trees to protect the crops from the strong wind.
sentences.chinese: 为保护庄稼免受强风侵害，村民在植树。

sentences.english: Planting trees and grass can not only resist but also fix sand.
sentences.chinese: 植树种草既能阻沙，又能固沙。

sentences.english: Thirdly, to increase afforestation to enhance carbon storage of forests.
sentences.chinese: 三是植树造林，增强森林储碳能力。

sentences.english: Today is Arbor Day What are you going to do?
sentences.chinese: 今天是植树节，你有什么打算吗？

sentences.english: Host city efforts have been variable, with a general over-reliance on tree planting.
sentences.chinese: 主办城市的努力一直在变动，而且过于依赖植树。

sentences.english: Park trees planted flowers, potted and decorative during which a large number.
sentences.chinese: 园内遍植树木花卉，并以大量盆花点缀其间。

sentences.english: Then the government and the ordinary people started to plant trees in the spring.
sentences.chinese: 政府和普通群众便开始在春天植树造林。

sentences.english: To tackle the erosion problem, a large area of suitable mountains has been reforested .
sentences.chinese: 为了解决侵蚀问题，大面积的适宜荒山已经植树造林。

sentences.english: The students in Grade one in the high school planted trees in the Jiangbin park last Sunday.
sentences.chinese: 上星期天，高一年级的同学去江滨公园植树。

sentences.english: Afforestation has been promoted heavily in mid-latitudes as a means of mitigating climate change.
sentences.chinese: 在中纬度地区大力提倡植树造林以减缓气候变化。

definition: Arbor Day (March 12th), also known as National Tree Planting Day 全民義務植樹日|全民义务植树日[Quan2 min2 Yi4 wu4 Zhi2 shu4 ri4]
to make green with plants/to reforest/(Internet slang) Islamization
to chop wood/to chop down trees
to excavate/to dig out a cave
